attributes.action: recognise that Baby P was betrayed by a system that was supposed to protect him, and therefore bring criminal prosecutions against anyone from this system proved to have prolonged his agony.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not need yet another review of the agencies who came into contact with Baby P, and who disregarded their duty of care to him. I am outraged to think that those professionals who 'misread' his pain as normal behaviour may get away with a formal reprimand. Therefore, I believe that if there is evidence which proves that an individuals negligence contributed to a furtherance of Baby P's torture and agonising death, they should face criminal prosecution without delay. I don't want the people involved, however high up, to be shielded by a system which is so obviously flawed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
